title: All 32 - Tampa Bay Bucs: Breaking down Tom Brady's Super Bowl window and offensive weapons with Jon Ledyard (Football 6/20)
description:
Tom Brady is in Tampa and we have a whole lot to talk about on this Bucs episode of 'All 32'. Jon Ledyard of Pewter Report joins Ryan Wilson to discuss expectations for Brady within Bruce Arians offense (2:00), how the team helped their quarterback through the draft (5:00), and the return of Rob Gronkowski (9:30). Sure, the offense has the star appeal, but is the defense subsequently getting overlooked (13:45)? Finally, Jon lays out some Super Bowl hopes (17:15).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @ryanwilsonCBS, @LedyardNFLDraft
